column2: select c.table_name, ci.field_name, c.column_name--ci.*, c.ORDINAL_POSITION, c.column_name as realname from information_schema.columns c inner join metadata.columninfo ci on c.column_name = ci.column_name+#+cast (ci.id as varchar (#) ) and ci.table_name = c.table_name where c.table_schema = # order by c.table_name, c.ORDINAL_POSITION
